title: Youdh Abraham Manti’s CV
text:
Finance Major, Business Analytics Minor.

abr22002@byui.edu | My LinkedIn Profile | (385) 354-9044



Seeking opportunities in Data Analytics and Finance.


Financial Statements, Basic Accounting Principles, Data Verification.



Data Analytics, Financial Dashboards, Process Automation, Auditing.




February 2023 - March 2026 Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, Idaho - BS Finance, Minor in Business Analytics - Awarded Academic Grant




Data Analytics: Financial Statements, Basic Accounting Principles
Tools: Excel (Pivot Tables, VBA, Macros), Power BI, Python, SQL
Languages: English (Fluent), Hindi (Fluent), Telugu (Native), Tamil (Proficient)




August 2025 - September 2025 M/s UJJINENI & CO, Chartered Accountants, Hyderabad, India - Audit Assistant - Returned for a second tenure due to high-quality deliverables. - Executed complex data verification for financial audits using advanced Excel functions (VLOOKUP, Pivot Tables). - Ensured 100% accuracy in client financial reporting.
August 2024 - January 2025 Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, Idaho - BA-215 Excel Spreadsheet TA - Guided 30+ students on advanced Excel functions (Pivot Tables, VBA, IF functions, advanced charts). - Improved Excel proficiency by 10% among students through detailed feedback on 300+ projects.



July 2025 SQL Associate, Data Camp
April 2025 Business Administration, BYU-Idaho
